content: It's a gorgeous looking game. Really is one of the best looking games on mobile. It's honestly more of the same compared to the first game. Which is good and bad. The good is that I enjoyed what I played of it. However I was hoping for more honestly. Don't get me wrong if you haven't played the first game you'll definitely enjoy this game. It's well worth it's asking price of 5 dollars. It's just feels way too similar to the first game in terms of the contents available. Online is dead FYI tho.

Will not work on samsung galaxy tab A after Android 10 update. Will load, then crash every time. Before update, it worked decently. First SR was far better, missions too short and too difficult, even on easy setting. Would like a refund please.
Love it.
dont feel to shoot at dots (planes),size is too small.otherwise it is the best dog fight game available on play store .

Edit: S10 users should set the game to full screen mode in game booster to ensure the full screen is visible and to fix and control response issue. Hopefully the devs can find a way to make the game enable this setting by default since the bottom quarter of the screen is cut off and some controls (like fast forward) don't work without it. Still, this game is perfect dogfighting on mobile. I'm looking forward to its continued development.
No, Sky Gamblers: Storm Raiders 1 is a far better game.

It's a very good game.Made a purchase to unlock full potential of the game.Campaign mode should be little large.Even in medium difficulty i am having problem but enjoyable. If u improve compatibility it will be better. Did u guys increase the difficulty of the game?

I downloaded this game a few days ago, and absolutely love it! One of my favorite parts of this game are the destructible environments. I've played all of the games in this series, and this one definitely has the potential to be the best. There are some planes that I'd like to see added in the future like the F6 Hellcat. The AI is greatly improved, and tail gunners will even shoot at enemies! Definitely worth the price. Update: changed rating from 4 to 5 stars because many bugs were fixed.
Best mobile plane shooting game by now,graphic is amazing,control is smooth,totally beyond my expectation.

content: I bought this game thinking it was going to be like the previous popular game, war wings, but It was far from it.

Unresponsive gamepad stick controls with input lag. I don't know if the planes are SUPPOSED to be hard to control, but it just doesn't feel good to play. Also, no matter what settings are used, there's plenty of frame drops. While the game does look better than the previous game, it is only just barely yet it performs way worse. Also, there is a severe need for an option to completely turn off gyro. Even if the sensitivity is turned all the way down, it can sometimes interfere with gameplay.
replyContent: Hi Arthran, You may want to lower the graphics settings from the options menu, this way you should see less lag while playing. There is a mode which doesn't allow accelerometer to interfere, so make sure you have selected Casual in the Gameplay tab
